about_the_game:
Travel through different labyrinths to track down the stolen crown before the monarchy crumbles. Stay one step ahead of the culprit using unique abilities to stun, bait and trap. In this rougelite with jrpg elements.

Years have passed since the king's death and now with the recent death of the queen. It is up to the princess to lead the kingdom, with her coronation on the horizon the kingdom is preparing for the new monarch. As a mysterious force works from the shadows to halt the coronation, the king reappears stealing the crown for himself. With madness seeping into the kingdom it is up to the royal guard to retrieve the stolen crown and uncover the truth, before the kingdom succumbs to complete madness.

Gameplay

  • Play as the Royal Gaurd a secret team of elite specialists tasked with hunting down the king and returning the crown. Switch between each character in real time.

  • Travel through different labyrinths in this rougelite, and get as far as possible before the armies of the unknown force overwhelm you.

  • Call allies to your aid, collect health orbs to regain health and collect the key orb to unlock the gate to the next labyrinth.

  • (Warning still in progress) Use the castle fortress as a central hub where you can upgrade your characters and test out abilities.

  • (Warning still in progress) Use each character's unique ability to trap and bait all enemies to stop them from getting between you and the king.

name: Crown's Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 /AMD Phenom II X4-945
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB /AMD Radeon RX 460 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 /AMD Phenom II X4-945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB /AMD Radeon RX 460 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
